content: You can then take the Lambrew to the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove in Black Wind Mountain by travelling via the Shrines. He will let you switch it into your Gourd from the Coconut Wine or any other drink you have.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lambrew.md', within the main section titled 'Lambrew', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Lambrew location'.
The content is as follows:
You can then take the Lambrew to the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove in Black Wind Mountain by travelling via the Shrines. He will let you switch it into your Gourd from the Coconut Wine or any other drink you have.
